title: jpeg rose
body: dom teased jpeg rose which would become Rose #1

title: Blitnauts Announcement
body: dom teases initial artwork of Blitnauts

title: Blitnaut #1: Cici
body: Cici was the 1st Blitnaut to introduced to the Blitmap universe, announced via Twitter on June 19th, 2021.

title: Blitnaut #2: Roscoe
body: Roscoe was the 2nd Blitnaut to introduced to the Blitmap universe, announced via Twitter on June 24th, 2021.

title: Blitnaut #3: Fizz
body: Fizz was the 3rd Blitnaut to introduced to the Blitmap universe, announced via Twitter on June 27th, 2021.

title: Blitnaut #4: Argo
body: Argo was the 4th Blitnaut to introduced to the Blitmap universe, announced via Twitter on July 1st, 2021.

title: The Blitmap collection has been completed
body: All 1700 Blitmaps have been crafted, the collection minted out on July 2nd, 2021.

title: The Blitnaut Name Contest
body: @Antonucci won The Blitnaut Name Contest where the grand prize was an Original blitmap, and two runnners-up won siblings!

title: Eggplant City was burned
body: 0xBB sent Eggplant City to burn address reducing the total supply of Blitmaps to 1699

title: $BLITSQUAD
body: BLITSQUAD was a PartyBid for bidding on our commemorative piece on Foundation initiated by itzler on behalf of Variant Fund.

title: Sugar (Genesis) - A Game
body: Sugar.game has been teased and the imagery of the first item has been shared

title: Sugar (Genesis) - Song of Fire
body: Song of Fire was just airdropped to all Blitmap owners.

title: Blitmap is public domain
body: The original Blitmap collection was made public domain under CC0.

title: The Blitnauts Launch
body: The Blitnauts expansion pack has officially launched!

title: The Blitnauts Launch
body: The Blitnauts expansion pack has officially launched!
